= Regulation =
    * What is regulation?
        * Censorship
        * Safe practices
            * Right and wrong
        * Limitation/restrictions
            * What others restrict us from doing
        * Laws
        * Protection
            * Environmental
            * Safety
            * Economic
    * Who makes regulations?
        * Government
        * FCC
        * AAC
        * FDA - Food adn drug administration
        * others
        * Yourself / Self Regulation
        * Data Collection Companies self-regulation
            * Restrict who has access (encryption)
        * Banks
            * Lots of risks
        * 
    * Self regulation
        * Who self regulates?
            * Defense companies (cybersecurity/military)
            * Controversial companies
            * Companies that want to protect users/ourselves
            * Tesla
        * Motivations for Autonomous Vehicles
            * Not getting sued
            * Safety
            * Reputation (stock holders / hype)
            * Sets standard for future
            * Transparency
            * Quality
            * Trust
        * What needs to be regulated in a car
            * Protection against loss/Who can access the car
            * Batteries
            * Environment adaptation
            * As safe as a "normal" car
    * Companies
        * Good things about self-regulation
            * Control
            * Simplifies things
            * Clear tangible roadmap
        * Bad things about self-regulation
            * Can slow progress
            * Costly initially
= Future =
    * Net Neutrality
